name: morsechat
description: Allows for communication via jank morse code.
author: astrsk

commands.name: morse
commands.description: sends a message to a user, translated to morse on their end

args.name: message
args.description: message to be sent to player

commands.name: m
commands.description: (alias of /morse) sends a message to a user, translated to morse on their end

args.name: message
args.description: message to be sent to player

commands.name: r
commands.description: Replies to the user who sent you the latest message

args.name: message
args.description: message to be sent as a reply
